trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There was one other sighting in Orlando on or around April 9th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw two orange orbs stationary and then a third one was behind them lifting from the tree tops bigger and brighter than the other two. once it reached the same elevation as the others its orange glow became smaller untill it was the sames size as the other two and it started to move toward the others. when it caught up to the other two orbs all three started to move northwest slowly. i watched it as long as i could to see if they would make eratic movements but they just keept going till i couldnt see them due to the trees. they were silent and there was an air plane close to them traveling a differnt flight path as the orbs and they never converged in any matter with the plane but im sure the pilot saw them as well as highway traffic as they flew over interstate 4. i did call the police department non emergency to report what i saw in case they recived other calls about the same thing "they said they would check on it" lol, eather way i needed to be responsable and report what i saw.it didnt last long enough for me to get media in time.
